title: If owner / developer desires to construct inclusive housing,even though it is not mandatory, inclusive housing may be provided with prior NOC from MHADA with respect to requirement of EWS / LIG housing, then in addition to basic entitlement he shall be entitled for, additional 25% FSI of the land covered under Inclusive Housing on his remaining land
clause_text: If owner / developer desires to construct inclusive housing,even though it is not mandatory, inclusive housing may be provided with prior NOC from MHADA with respect to requirement of EWS / LIG housing, then in addition to basic entitlement he shall be entitled for, additional 25% FSI of the land covered under Inclusive Housing on his remaining land.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
